name: Tanks Thunder - Red Zone Alert
description:
Tanks Thunder - Red Zone Alert

Unforgettable battles against real opponents in equipped tanks.

Face your enemy Tanks in the battlefield and feel the combat power of your tank.

• Real-time Battle
• Realistic Physics
• Real opponents
• Wide selection of tanks
• Various upgrade modules
• Lots of camouflage and decal types
• Lots of world arenas

It's real metal force!
